body:
Why is this even a thing. I've never seen anyone spamming on the forums, and there's constantly staff online to deal with it. IMO this needs to be removed/changed.

Also why is there no subforum... for forums... It means I pretty much had to post this in off topic or game discussion. And neither make any sense.
